event_description: Mutual, in collaboration with Circuit Festival '16, it presents WOMEN'S VISIONS, a group exhibition in which six artists present their particular view of women, from a female point of view. Artists: Laura Rodellas Photography Nuria Riaza Mariana Mizarela Orne Cabrita Register Registrated Mariona Berenguer Roldan + info

Opening August 4, 19h. Danifilias & Sisfobias From 04 August to 8 September 2016 in the art space VERDI_VERD expose two of the most promising Catalan artists illustration, Daniel Paez & MrSis Enlightenment is a choice selection of his most recent works, which are evidence of the great masters as illustrators, while catch us with their wonderful and magnetic creativity. + info

Everyone wears a mask at the entrance of BAR-apartment.inside there are things to see (through the eyes of the mask) and something cool to drink (through the mouth of the mask). it will be a hot Maskenball! including: Fito Conesa sounds yanik works Soland and fran Glez. Carrer de Valencia 72. Ring in the apartment 4th floor 3. A draft Yanik Soland (* 1990) in the context of "Basel comes to BAR", a collaboration with the Institut Kunst Basel host a student of a summer in the Barcelona. + info
